testcase.name: Verify whether the user can use trash functionality in posts section to retrieve the deleted posts
testcase.system-out: Given User is on the login page.............................................passed When User enter username and password.......................................passed Then User clicks on login button............................................passed And User is redirected to dashboard.........................................passed And User navigates to posts section.........................................passed Then User is redirected to Posts section....................................passed When User clicks on trash option............................................passed And User selects multiple checkboxes of trash posts items...................passed Then User clicks on bulk actions of trash functionality.....................passed And User selects restore option in bulk functionality"<restore>"............passed Then User clicks on apply button in trash section...........................passed
